Runic Armor: This unit is equipped with Runic Gauntlets, channeling the power of their master's [moon]Runic Core[/].  Requires a [item]Power Source (Mountain Copper)[/] to function.
Enhances the power of those channeling this core.
This unit is equipped with Runic Armor, channeling the power of their master's [moon]Runic Core[/].  Requires a [item]Power Source (Sky Iron)[/] to function.
Enhances the durability of those channeling this core.
This unit is equipped with a Runic Shield, channeling the power of their master's [moon]Runic Core[/].  Requires a [item]Power Source (Corrupted Adamantium)[/] to function.
